# outputTexture

**Instance Property**

The output texture into which this scaler writes its output.

## Declaration

```swift
var outputTexture: (any MTLTexture)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You are responsible for providing a texture with a private `storageMode` to this property.
title: outputTexture
